name: BOOM BOOM BOOM!
description:
A fun balloon shooting game designed by my 2.5 year old daughter! Our first game made together, we made it for #KIDSJAM. It was a super fun time to make a game with my daughter, and she really loved watching it come to life. She loves playing it too!

Title: Frankie

Game Design: Frankie (with a little help from Bob and Mykaelos)

Programming: Mykaelos

Art: Play Doh by Frankie and Mykaelos

Sounds: Frankie

Font: Si Kancil by Adien Gunarta

Menu Music: Ponies and Balloons by The Green Orbs

Game Music: Racing The Clock by The Green Orbs
